attributes.action: King Arthur's Day instead of St George's Day
attributes.additional_details:
King Arthur was a true leader or Britain, with many tales of his knights, round tables, sword in the stone, the lady of the lake, merlin and stonehenge and the list goes on.

St George was probably not British so the story goes, we celebrate St Patricks day more than St George's Day. We should firmly stand by what was a true King, and really bring the King to Life.
